content: As this is AVICII beat legend, it should really be called AVICII's invector: mobile edition
Not enough songs and the controls are a little clunky and the levels aren't all that challenging

Amazing game but IT NEEDS WAY MORE SONGS LIKE LITERALLY ALL THE SONGS INCLUDING UNRELEASED TRACKS PLEASE MAKE THIS GAME NEXT LEVEL OR SHOULD I SAY NEXT LEVELS /][/ RIP AVICII RIP TIM BERGLING The guy below said it I'll give it 5 stars when it has more songs and difficulties.

Great game, and this exactly the type of game I'm looking for when it comes to the difficult levels, but I'm pretty sure the last part of Hey Brother is broken, as I've played the level multiple times, without screwing up there and it keeps saying I did. If it wasn't for that I would give this 5 stars
replyContent: Hi Peter - thank you for your review, and for catching that. You are right about Hey Brother :). We just pushed a new update that should resolve this issue. Please try again!

content: Love it, need I say more?
Love it, just i hope you guys add more songs, like the original broken arrows and the other versions of the song levels.
Great gameplay but wish that every song had different difficulties because I want a challenge for some song that are on easy and wish for them to be on hard
Really great game, very similar to Invector. Must add a few more songs though...
Make more game modes and songs and then I'll enjoy the game and give 5 stars

I am clearly incapable, but my hand eye coordination is shocking to be fair, and feel I have insulted this game by attempting lol. I love the fact that this game has been created. Gameplay is good too, as are the tunes... obviously ðŸ˜Š
This game is great but I prefer the original The Night to The Night remix
I like the game, <3 Avicii. When are more songs going to be available???
replyContent: Hi Matthew, we'll have new songs soon! Stay tuned.

content: Hi there, thank you so much for making this happened. I love AVICII and his legacy and rhythm games. There is only one thing i wish to be fixed. I'm not sure if it's because of the OS on my phone or the app but all other apps product sounds just fine with the new feature from Android 11 (screen recorder) but this app. Please check and correct it so i can share the gameplay to everyone. Thank you

Overall, I love the game. It's a really enjoyable tribute to Avicii. My only complaints are that there are not enough beats to tap on (especially for Heaven) compared to how many beats there are in the song, and this makes it a little too easy. In fact, the hard part with many beats was all at the end of the song which was overwhelming. I think it should be distributed throughout for better enjoyment. The other problem is that you can't choose the difficulty for individual songs, to start.
replyContent: Hi Braydon, thank you for the review! We'll have new difficulty modifiers in a future update. Stay tuned!

content: I really liked this game. However, I fail to see why there's no difficulty system in this game much like Invector. I love the game, and it's music. However, the songs don't have difficulty sliders. Instead, some songs are hard, some songs are easy.
replyContent: Hi Lukas, thank you for the review! We'll have new difficulty modifiers in a future update. Stay tuned!

content: Bought the game but won't open on my OnePlus 8 pro. Tried it on my daughter's OnePlus 6 and it worked as it should. So please fix the bug and hopefully I can give you a 5* review when I can actually play the game. ( App opens till I get the message: in loving memory and then it doesn't do anything. Update September 20: Problems are solved and game is working now. Love the game and music. So a well deserved 5* ðŸ‘
replyContent: Hi Vicky, sorry to hear about your issue with the title on your OnePlus 8 Pro. We're aware of this issue and our working on a fix. Please contact us at support@atari.com and we will gladly help you in resolving it.

content: Great app to play on the go or for YouTube content, I wish this game had more tracks to play. I also have a song idea, if you search Avicii Mix on youtube, there is one which is about 6-8 minutes long and is a mix of Avicii's popular songs synced together, this would be great to add to the game, if this isn't possible, the song "For a better day" is a good song to add. One glitch I found which can ruin people's scores: The screen turns white randomly on Hey Brother randomly on Samsung G S10+.
I love the game overall. However, I would suggest to put more difficult charts to the songs. Add maybe 'mirror mode' 'shuffle mode' to the steps for example.
replyContent: Hi Henry, thank you for your review, and your suggestion! We're working on adding gameplay modifiers for a future update. Stay tuned!

content: Downloaded this game a few weeks ago on my OnePlus 7 Pro and worked fine. Today I tried to play and it's completely unplayable. Audio is glitchy to the point I had to mute. Do not download this game.
replyContent: Hi Ben, really sorry to hear this. Could you please contact us at support@atari.com? We want to help resolve this issue asap. Thanks!

content: Great game

Nice game much like Invector for PS4, but was a bit difficult controlling at first, but now slowly picking it up. The performance needs to be improved as there are some stuttering, and I played in perfect graphics with 60fps limit. Also the game is lagging when tried to Screen record.
Nice game , waiting for more avicii songs in the future. If you can make it landscape mode it would be nice.
replyContent: Hello Eric, we've added landscape mode! Please try out our latest update, now available in the store. Cheers!

content: Where is the exit button to come out of the game once finished.

I love it except 1 thing, it doesn't keep the beat at all, I'm a avid player of the PS4 version, it DOES NOT, keep time with the beat at all. I would give this a 5 star, but the only problem is that it doesn't keep with the beat and rhythm, plus I wish that there was an equalizer in the settings so that it times with the player too, the PS4 version does, please fix this, Me and many others paid for it, the designers should of thought about this before putting it up on Google.
replyContent: Hello Karmen, thank you for the review. We just released an update that includes new audio calibration options that should help with any lag you found (especially when using Bluetooth headphones). Please give it a try. Cheers!

content: Nice game, Turkish translation is horrible though.
Game is great. Spanish translation is horrible. Can i help you with the translation? â˜ºï¸
replyContent: Hi Javi, thanks for the feedback and bringing this to our attention - our new update should address this. It's now live in the store. Cheers!

content: Overall quality is really good but performance needs to be improved.
replyContent: Thank you for your review and feedback! For performance improvements, you can try toggling off the backgrounds, or adjusting the FPS and graphics quality, by tapping the "Graphics" button from the Main Menu options. We're also preparing additional performance optimizations for future updates. Cheers!
